text: "Yeah Right" (stylized in all caps) is a song by Japanese singer-songwriter Joji. It is the first single from his debut album, Ballads 1. ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- !scope="col"|Chart (2018–19) !scope="col"|Peak position |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ) | 38 |- ! scope="row"| US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) | 21 |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2018 songs Category:2018 singles Category:Joji (musician) songs Category:Rhythm and blues ballads Category:Song recordings produced by Patrick Wimberly
title: Yeah Right (Joji song)
